card1.title: Design, Operation & Optimization of Service Runtime Infrastructure
card1.p1: Designed and built production infrastructure including container runtimes such as EKS and ECS, covering CD, observability, scaling, and security.
card1.p2: Established GitOps with ArgoCD Helm management, ensured observability across all services with Datadog APM, enabled auto-scaling with HPA and Cluster Autoscaler, and improved production stability by isolating CronJob workloads. Also hardened security by eliminating shared PEM keys and configuring RDS audit logs.
card1.p3: Reduced backend memory usage by 10% through query redesign eliminating N+1 issues and implementing staged data fetching. Automated IaC operations by building Terraform CI/CD pipelines.
card1.note: Led planning and execution of ~20% infrastructure cost reduction:
noteItems: Right-sizing compute resources and introducing auto-scaling
Reviewing, estimating, and driving container runtime migration

card2.title: Building Type-Safe & Testing Infrastructure for Speed and Quality
card2.p1: Built an auto-generation pipeline from Kotlin → OpenAPI → typed HTTP clients. Also established automated testing infrastructure for both backend and frontend, and created testing guidelines with appropriate granularity based on past bug cases.
card2.p2: This reduced type-mismatch bugs and cut manual verification effort. Achieved a type-safe development workflow that detects API inconsistencies at compile time.
card2.p3: Additionally built architecture tests to detect Clean Architecture violations and automated test environments using test DBs. Established a TDD foundation compatible with AI coding tools, accelerating the development cycle.
card2.note: Led the initiative from proposal to CTO and team members through to adoption. Organized study sessions to help the team adopt it naturally.

card3.title: Designing & Building Backend Systems with Managed Services
card3.p1: For AI generation features (images/videos) requiring 1+ minute processing times, designed and built an SQS-based async processing infrastructure to achieve fault tolerance impossible with synchronous APIs.
card3.p2: Designed and built a toC authentication system using ElastiCache (Redis). Proposed and adopted a proxy authentication approach, eliminating the need for dedicated authentication screens.
